YEAR ANNUAL SHA. MONTH BREAKER/GREATER CONSUMER. WHITE TIGER ENTERING CENTRAL PALACE. Sword Edge. Month Punishment. Red Phoenix. Lesser Red Embrace. Unsuccessful. Voluminous Day. 4 Abandonment Day. 

Initiate Day Usage:
•Commencing or beginning something, that requires a good beginning. Ground breaking, business opening.
•Good to accept work engagements or assignments. Signing agreements.
•Starting a new project on a good footing. House renovation.
•Test the market to see who are the right persons or right leads.
•NOT FOR moving house, or travelling. All Initiate Days have Lesser Consumer Stars which are associated with wealth loss.

Mound Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for business & personal activities, marriage, business deals, renovations, building or adding extensions to property. Best star with no negative attributes. Guardian for wealth & prosperity. Household occupants successful & even famous. 

Yellow Belt Bright Hall:
• Get help, meet helpful people.
• Position bed & stove, renovations, move house.
• Good for status, position & career.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@9-11am. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Heavenly Fortune:
• Good for meetings, social gatherings, moving house.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR ANNUAL SHA:
• Obstacles, accidents & delays. 
• Harms children/pets.
• Avoid starting projects with tight timelines, submitting documents that require quick approval or engaging in property-related transactions.

MONTH BREAKER/GREATER CONSUMER:
• Causes loss of wealth. NOT FOR product launch, wealth related activities.
• Useable to destroy or remove something. Can create inconvenient or uncomfortable feelings, so that day, start a planned out program.

WHITE TIGER ENTERS CENTRAL PALACE: 
• Avoid surgery, Feng Shui activities, construction, renovation, ground breaking & moving house.
• Avoid major activities.

Sword Edge:
• Brings injuries & petty people.
• Avoid burial & renovation.

Month Punishment:
• Careless mistakes, especially in professional fields (e.g. doctors etc.)
• Avoid starting new job, trading, renovation.

Red Phoenix:
• Creates a lot of hatred & arguments. 
• Avoid marriage, moving house, opening new door.
• Avoid discussions on this day.

Lesser Red Embrace:

Duke Reward. Earthly Wealth. Six Combo. Five Fortune. Important Stability. Precious Light. Heavenly Wish. 

MONTH ROBBERY SHA. Sickness Charm. Heavenly Officer Charm. Illness Star. Spirit Separator. Lesser Red Embrace. Eight Seats. Knife Block. Earth Forbid. 

Receive Day Usage:
•Attain something in particular: rewards.
•Ask & get in return.
•Start school, commence a course, close a deal, ask for a raise, propose marriage or ask for a new job.
•Recruitment, money collection, or collecting bad debts. 
•NOT FOR burial, seeking medical treatment, attending funerals, visit the sick unless you want to receive their illness.

House Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for marriage (offspring within 3 years), burial (descendants with positions), progress, prayer, installing roof beams, travel & migration. 
•NOT for investment, visiting tailor, financial investments.

Yellow Belt Precious Light:
• Getting help & looking for Nobleman.
• Good for travel.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
Duke Reward:
• Good for wealth purposes & investment.
• Good for money related activations & activities.
• Abundance, prosperity, wealth, auspicious for all activities.

Earthly Wealth:
• Supports long term investments (property, businesses, assets, investments).
• Good impact for starting or launching a business, creating value.

Six Combo:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Five Fortune:
• Good for people gathering activities, e.g. announcement of marriage.
• Commence new business, new job, move into new house, burial, repairs.

Important Stability:
• Creates stability. Good to sign documents, keep important things.
• Good for physical security, safety measures, security systems, install CCTV.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Precious Light:
• Nobleman help. Good for travel.

Heavenly Wish:
• Wish fulfilment, prayer.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTH ROBBERY SHA:
• Cheated, robbed, injury, business issues. No sales.
• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

Sickness Charm:
• Brings illness and legal problems

Heavenly Officer Charm:
• Brings gossip.
• Avoid signing contracts.

Illness Star:
• Avoid surgery, treatment & medical procedures.

Spirit Separator:
• Avoid spiritual activities, prayer.

Lesser Red Embrace:
• Unnecessary issues & troubles. Arguments & disputes.
• Avoid moving house (fire within 100 days), marriage (remarry within 100 days or cause deaths in family), travel (may not come back).

Eight Seats:
• Effort unappreciated. Get more work, but no extra money.
• Avoid career matters, or starting work.

Knife Block:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

Earth Forbid:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

Heavenly Messenger:
• Creates bad omen & auras. 
• Miscommunication prone. Tendency to receive wrong information or fake news. Do not convey information on this day.

Red Phoenix:
• Creates a lot of hatred & arguments. 
• Avoid marriage, moving house, opening new door.
• Avoid discussions on this day.

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

Do Not Visit The Sick Day:

• Tendency to acquire what the person has.
• Avoid going to places with poor hygiene.

Heavenly Doctor. Gold Hall. Earthly Storage. Jade Hall. 

MONTH SHA. YANG GONG DISASTER DAY (Lunar)Earthly Thief. Blood Branch. Illness Star. 

Close Day Usage:
•Qi is at the lowest point, last day of the cycle.
•Possible to use for medication & qigong.
•If you or your partner is having an interesting relationship, choosing a close day can reduce the impact.
•End something undesirable, to have no connection in the future.
•NOT FOR anything that is important or of personal or professional significance. Not for surgery, or acupuncture.

Well Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for Feng Shui activities, aligning door or water placement, ground breaking or commencing a work project.
•NOT for burial, signing contracts and marriage.

Yellow Belt Jade Hall:
• Wealth star, business dealings, paperwork, transactions involving assets, meet boss, burial. 
• Indicates fame & favourable for career.
• AVOID renovations, repair.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
Heavenly Doctor:
• Good for medication, seeking doctor.  NOT FOR surgery.

Gold Hall:
• For those under employment. Meet superior for career upgrade, title recognition, increment, promotions. Need to connect to Bazi to get what you want.
• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Earthly Storage:
• Good for long term wealth, e.g. blue-chip investments, sign long-term agreements. Acquire long-term assets.

Jade Hall:
• Wealth star. Good for business dealings, paperwork, transactions involving assets, meet boss, burial. 
• AVOID renovations, repair.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTH SHA:
• Obstacles, accidents & delays. 
• Harms children/pets.
• Avoid starting projects with tight timelines, submitting documents that require quick approval or engaging in property-related transactions.

YANG GONG DISASTER DAY:
• Avoid Feng Shui activations & appointments.

Earthly Thief:
• Loss of items externally. Ensure items are well kept.

Blood Branch:
• Likelihood of small injuries. Avoid surgery & acupuncture.

Illness Star:
• Avoid surgery, health treatments, and medical procedures.

Sky Horse. Bright Star. Heavenly Fortune. Abundant Fortune. 

MONTH ESTABLISH. Sky Bright. Destructive. Unsuccessful. Voluminous Day. Earth Mansion. 4 Abandonment Day. 

Close Day Usage:
•Qi is at the lowest point, last day of the cycle.
•Possible to use for medication & qigong.
•If you or your partner is having an interesting relationship, choosing a close day can reduce the impact.
•End something undesirable, to have no connection in the future.
•NOT FOR anything that is important or of personal or professional significance. Not for surgery, or acupuncture.

Net Constellation Usage:
•Generally benevolent star that brings about harmonious outcomes, peaceful relationships and is generally a good day for most activities.
•SUITABLE for construction, land acquisition, marriage. 
•NOT for other commencements.

Black Belt White Tiger:
• Indicates mourning & funeral.
• Physical injuries & accidents. Potential lawsuits.
• Bleeding, pain and health issues.
• Avoid surgery & high-risk activities.
• Suitable for competition & contests.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
Sky Horse:
• Good for free lance or business that requires travelling.
• If with Year breaker, sometimes good, sometimes negative impact. 
• Can activate if breakthrough is needed.

Bright Star:
• Visibility, fame, popularity. Entertainment related.
• Good for social media postings.

Heavenly Fortune:
• Good for meetings, social gatherings, moving house.

Abundant Fortune:
• Increasing sales, upselling. Outstanding launching. Celebrations.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTH ESTABLISH:
• Employees: Don't do presentations, suggest ideas, performance reviews. Don’t meet or discuss with boss. Don't argue, just listen to the boss. 
• Employer: Good day to get rid of an unwanted subordinate.
• Avoid Feng Shui activation, renovation, ground breaking or knocking on wall.

Sky Bright:
• Creates bad omen & auras. 
• Avoid spiritual activities, prayer.

Destructive:
• Turns all things positive to negative.
• Avoid important activities.

Unsuccessful:
• Whatever started ends up cancelled or terminated.

Voluminous Day:
• Both good & bad effects doubled or amplified. Buy one get one free.
• Only good for wealth matters. Successful launching of business will receive double the rewards.
• Avoid burial, cremation, marriage.

Earth Mansion:
• Do not start renovation on this day. 
• Small wealth loss.

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

Heavenly Path: NORTH

• FENG SHUI only. Does not apply to Date Selection.

HEAVENLY VIRTUE. Yin Noble. Duke Branch Virtue. Brightness. Universal Protection. 

YEAR ROBBERY SHA. No Wealth Day (Minor). Sword Edge. Month Harm. Grappling Hook. Wooden Horse. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. 

Balance Day Usage:
•Good for marriage, construction, business negotiation. Commencing travel.
•Produces a balanced outcome.
•When you are less powerful, use this to restore the balance.
•Nothing major happens when you use this day.
•NOT FOR lawsuits, distribution of wealth, contesting a will or division of assets & burial, launching, legal actions.

Bow Constellation Usage:
•This is one of the few stars that only has positive aspects. 
•SUITABLE for commercial & personal activities, marriage, endeavours, open your new business, sign contracts & purchase assets. This has multiplier effect.

Black Belt Grappling Hook:
• Cheated, framed or involved in others' affairs. Avoid making promises or signing contracts.
• Indicates delays & obstacles.
• Useable to cheat others.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
HEAVENLY VIRTUE
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Cancels all negative energies (can ignore bad stars). 

Yin Noble:
• Helpful people luck. Usually female.
• Use this day if you know the person that can help you is female.
• Useable for corporate recruitment.

Duke Branch Virtue:
• Activates positive energy. Negate & neutralize negative Qi.        
• Good for forming new businesses.

Brightness:
• Visibility, fame, popularity. Entertainment related.
• Good for social media postings.

Universal Protection:
• Spiritual stability & protection, meditations, cleansing. 
• Personal protection, e.g. vaccination. 
• Install Feng Shui cures, e.g. metal placement for 5Y.
• Temple building day in olden times.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR ROBBERY SHA:
• Cheated, robbed, injury, business issues. No sales.
• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

No Wealth Day (Minor). :
• Avoid for trading & wealth related activities, moving office, product launch.
• Avoid signing contracts, closing business deals, business trips or official openings.
• Does not matter if doing activities NOT related to wealth, e.g. medical consultation. 

Sword Edge:

Receive Day Usage:
•Attain something in particular: rewards.
•Ask & get in return.
•Start school, commence a course, close a deal, ask for a raise, propose marriage or ask for a new job.
•Recruitment, money collection, or collecting bad debts. 
•NOT FOR burial, seeking medical treatment, attending funerals, visit the sick unless you want to receive their illness.

Beak Constellation Usage:
•Considered a highly negative and unfavourable star to have present. Avoid any important personal and business activities.
•NOT for all significant activities.

Yellow Belt Precious Light:

MONTHLY VIRTUE COMBO
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Creates meaningful relationships, build trust, networking, branding, sign agreement.

EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@9-11am. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Duke Reward:
• Good for wealth purposes & investment.
• Good for money related activations & activities.

Six Combo:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.

Five Fortune:
• Good for people gathering activities, e.g. announcement of marriage.
• Commence new business, new job, move into new house, burial, repairs.

Important Stability:

• Good for physical security, safety measures, security systems, install CCTV.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Precious Light:
• Nobleman help. Good for travel.

MONTH ROBBERY SHA:

• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

Sickness Charm:

Heavenly Officer Charm:

Illness Star:
• Avoid surgery, treatment & medical procedures.

Spirit Separator:

• Avoid moving house (fire within 100 days), marriage (remarry within 100 days or cause deaths in family), travel (may not come back).

GRAND DUKE. MONTH CALAMITY SHA. Duke Punishment. Great Sha. Heavenly Jail. Heavenly Bat. Heavenly Fire. Yellow Embrace. Drapes. Ignorant Class. Knife Block. Do Not Visit The Sick Day. 

Open Day Usage:
•Good for welcoming guest, opening shop or property.
•Official opening, house warming, commencing work after Chinese New Year after a long break.
•Signing agreements, marriage & business engagements.
•Start new job, assume new position, start education.
•NOT FOR burial & ground breaking.

Stomach Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for marriage & burial (heralds nobility, wealth, filial children), good health, happy events (promotions, health, good wealth).
•NOT for private/ internal matters, domestic issues, private business matters. 

Black Belt White Tiger:
• Indicates mourning & funeral.
• Physical injuries & accidents. Potential lawsuits.
• Bleeding, pain and health issues.
• Avoid surgery & high-risk activities.
• Suitable for competition & contests.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTHLY VIRTUE
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Cancels all negative energies (can ignore bad stars). 

Goat Blade:
• To do with authority and position.
• Used for leadership impact and to improve your position. 
• Helps you to take charge by taking someone else out.
• Motivation star. Can be used to reactivate personal motivation in a downward spiral.

Monthly Benevolence:
• Seek help or Nobleman. Get a favour, get someone to help you.

Life Generating:
• Great for creating energy & opportunities (within you, or external environment).
• Create/open new markets, construction.

Heavenly Horse:
• Great for creating energy & opportunities (within you, or external environment). Create/open new markets.
• Good for travelling or overseas business related matters to reduce obstacles.
• Speeds up the result of e-commerce transactions. 
• Additional or Bonus income. Settle outstanding matters.

Monthly Wealth:
• Money from hard work & industry.

Jade House:
• For those under employment. Meet superior for career upgrade, title recognition, increment, promotions. Need to connect to Bazi to get what you want.
• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Phoenix Day:
• Spiritual activities, removal, protection
• Soothing effects useful in assuaging physical pain, suffering & flared tempers.
• Negates bad luck & misfortune.
• Traditionally used as marriage dates to "remove" negative energies.
• NOT FOR FENGSHUI.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
GRAND DUKE:
• Strongest annual energy. Causes health issues, legal issues or arguments.
• Can activate on good day if there are delayed lawsuits, to get the lawsuits moving & solve the issues. Need to have positive stars for protection when doing this.

MONTH CALAMITY SHA:
• Illness. Relationship issues. Betrayal.
• Scandals & sex-related issues.
• Avoid marriage, meetings, networking & medical procedures.

Duke Punishment:
• Brings arguments and quarrels.
• Avoid groundbreaking and renovations.

Great Sha:
• Causes fighting & struggling. Death in extreme cases.

Heavenly Jail:
• Activities initiated will be stuck.
• Emotionally trapped & affected negatively. 
• Avoid settling disputes.

Heavenly Bat:
• Petty people. 
• Avoid settling lawsuits.

Heavenly Fire:
• Disputes outside of the family. External disputes.
• Useable to start disputes.

Yellow Embrace:
• Affects vitality, energy & longevity. Energy drained. Avoid travel.

Drapes:
• Avoid marriage, relationships, moving house. 
• Keeps bringing out bad memories & histories during arguments.

Ignorant Class:
• Bad relationships or response.
• E.g. wife trying to complain & the husband is ignoring the wife's complaints.

Knife Block:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

Do Not Visit The Sick Day:
• Avoid visiting those with  ailment, illness or injury.
• Tendency to acquire what the person has.
• Avoid going to places with poor hygiene.

DUKE VIRTUE. Month Emptiness. Three Harmony. Prosperity Star. Fortune Growth. Green Dragon. 

YEAR BREAKER. YEAR CALAMITY SHA. Five Ghost. 

Stable Day Usage:
•Good to things needing stability such as getting married. Start new job if you want to be there long-term. Hire key staff.
•Seal an agreement, long term project or a deal with long term effect.
•Official opening of business, commencing work in on a property, buying a pet, house warming & seeking medical treatment.
•Creating networks connections.

Void Constellation Usage:

Yellow Belt Green Dragon:

DUKE VIRTUE:
• Most positive of the energy of the year.
• Good stars remain positive &bad stars will be not as negative.

Month Emptiness:

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Prosperity Star:

• NOT FOR funeral days.

Fortune Growth:

• Helps in academics. 
• Temple building day in olden times.

Green Dragon:

• Good news, wealth opportunity, meet boss, suitable for all activities.

YEAR BREAKER:

DUKE VIRTUE COMBO. EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@5-7pm. Yin Noble. Duke Branch Virtue. Monthly Benevolence. Three Harmony. Monthly Wealth. Jade House. Yin Virtue. Heavenly Fortune. Bright Hall. Ten Spiritual Days. 

YEAR ROBBERY SHA. Man Separator. Five Ghost. 4 Abandonment Day. 

Stable Day Usage:
•Good to things needing stability such as getting married. Start new job if you want to be there long-term. Hire key staff.
•Seal an agreement, long term project or a deal with long term effect.
•Official opening of business, commencing work in on a property, buying a pet, house warming & seeking medical treatment.
•Creating networks connections.
•NOT FOR opening business, moving house, funeral, burial & travel as the effect will be consistent. 

Wall Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for marriage, official openings, signing a contract, burial. Heralds prosperity and an increase in wealth. 
•NOT for travelling South.

Yellow Belt Bright Hall:
• Get help, meet helpful people.
• Position bed & stove, renovations, move house.
• Good for status, position & career.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE COMBO:
• One of the most positive annual energies.
• Good stars remain positive & bad stars will be not as negative.
• Good for creating positive income & relationships.

EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@5-7pm. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Yin Noble:
• Helpful people luck. Usually female.
• Use this day if you know the person that can help you is female.
• Useable for corporate recruitment.

Duke Branch Virtue:
• Activates positive energy. Negate & neutralize negative Qi.        
• Good for forming new businesses.

Monthly Benevolence:
• Seek help or Nobleman. Get a favour, get someone to help you.

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Monthly Wealth:
• Money from hard work & industry.

Jade House:
• For those under employment. Meet superior for career upgrade, title recognition, increment, promotions. Need to connect to Bazi to get what you want.
• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Yin Virtue:
• Collect good karma. Dissolve bad karma. 
• Spiritual cleansing.
• Impact is stronger when with other positive stars.

Heavenly Fortune:
• Good for meetings, social gatherings, moving house.

Bright Hall:
• Auspicious.
• Get help, meet helpful people, position bed & stove, renovations, moving house.

Ten Spiritual Days:
• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR ROBBERY SHA:
• Cheated, robbed, injury, business issues. No sales.
• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

Man Separator:
• Inherit other's problems & emotions.

Five Ghost:
• Petty people. Avoid travel.
• Used to beat paper avatars of petty people with clogs.
• Can be used in a good way, they can also create fame & branding through other people's mouth: "That bitch is too good-looking. How unfair!" 

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

Three Harmony. Prosperity Star. Fortune Growth. Heavenly Fortune. Green Dragon. Advancement Star. 

YEAR BREAKER. YEAR CALAMITY SHA. Five Ghost. Voluminous Day. 4 Abandonment Day. 

Stable Day Usage:
•Good to things needing stability such as getting married. Start new job if you want to be there long-term. Hire key staff.
•Seal an agreement, long term project or a deal with long term effect.
•Official opening of business, commencing work in on a property, buying a pet, house warming & seeking medical treatment.
•Creating networks connections.

Wing Constellation Usage:
•Generally a negative star. Unfavourable for most activities.
•NOT for door alignment for Feng Shui purposes, burial and marriage, starting a new job or assume a new job position.

Yellow Belt Green Dragon:
• Most auspicious, good news, wealth opportunity, meet boss.
• Suitable for happy events & most activities.
• Brings about happiness & contentment in life.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Prosperity Star:
• Good for events Good/happy ending, even if the process is bad.
• Bad things may have happened to someone, but he doesn’t blame others, still see goodness in it & doesn't feel too sad.
• NOT FOR funeral days.

Fortune Growth:
• Good for gaining weight & building muscles.
• Helps in academics. 
• Temple building day in olden times.

Heavenly Fortune:
• Good for meetings, social gatherings, moving house.

Green Dragon:
• Most auspicious.
• Good news, wealth opportunity, meet boss, suitable for all activities.

Advancement Star:
• Good for academic & scholarly pursuits.
• Good for taking exams, starting to study a subject


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR BREAKER:
• Loss of property or wealth. Trouble for elderly family members.
• Lose recognition or ignored.
• Can use if you don't have good communication with family & want to create some impact, e.g. expose someone's anger & start to talk.

YEAR CALAMITY SHA:
• Illness. Relationship issues. Betrayal.
• Scandals & sex-related issues.
• Avoid marriage, meetings, networking & medical procedures.

Five Ghost:
• Petty people. Avoid travel.
• Used to beat paper avatars of petty people with clogs.
• Can be used in a good way, they can also create fame & branding through other people's mouth: "That bitch is too good-looking. How unfair!" 

Voluminous Day:
• Both good & bad effects doubled or amplified. Buy one get one free.
• Only good for wealth matters. Successful launching of business will receive double the rewards.
• Avoid burial, cremation, marriage.

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

• Less powerful if with negative month stars.

• Avoid surgery, health treatments, and medical procedures.

MONTH ROBBERY SHA. No Wealth Day (Minor). Sickness Charm. Heavenly Officer Charm. Illness Star. Spirit Separator. Lesser Red Embrace. Eight Seats. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. Knife Block. Earth Forbid. 

Receive Day Usage:
•Attain something in particular: rewards.
•Ask & get in return.
•Start school, commence a course, close a deal, ask for a raise, propose marriage or ask for a new job.
•Recruitment, money collection, or collecting bad debts. 
•NOT FOR burial, seeking medical treatment, attending funerals, visit the sick unless you want to receive their illness.

Mound Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for business & personal activities, marriage, business deals, renovations, building or adding extensions to property. Best star with no negative attributes. Guardian for wealth & prosperity. Household occupants successful & even famous. 

Yellow Belt Precious Light:
• Getting help & looking for Nobleman.
• Good for travel.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE COMBO:
• One of the most positive annual energies.
• Good stars remain positive & bad stars will be not as negative.
• Good for creating positive income & relationships.

Duke Reward:
• Good for wealth purposes & investment.
• Good for money related activations & activities.
• Abundance, prosperity, wealth, auspicious for all activities.

Earthly Wealth:
• Supports long term investments (property, businesses, assets, investments).
• Good impact for starting or launching a business, creating value.

Six Combo:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Five Fortune:
• Good for people gathering activities, e.g. announcement of marriage.
• Commence new business, new job, move into new house, burial, repairs.

Important Stability:
• Creates stability. Good to sign documents, keep important things.
• Good for physical security, safety measures, security systems, install CCTV.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Heavenly Noble:
• Get help from someone of similar status.
• Upgrade something, e.g. personal status.

Precious Light:
• Nobleman help. Good for travel.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTH ROBBERY SHA:
• Cheated, robbed, injury, business issues. No sales.
• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

No Wealth Day (Minor). :
• Avoid for trading & wealth related activities, moving office, product launch.
• Avoid signing contracts, closing business deals, business trips or official openings.
• Does not matter if doing activities NOT related to wealth, e.g. medical consultation. 

Sickness Charm:
• Brings illness and legal problems

Heavenly Officer Charm:
• Brings gossip.
• Avoid signing contracts.

Illness Star:
• Avoid surgery, treatment & medical procedures.

Spirit Separator:
• Avoid spiritual activities, prayer.

Lesser Red Embrace:
• Unnecessary issues & troubles. Arguments & disputes.
• Avoid moving house (fire within 100 days), marriage (remarry within 100 days or cause deaths in family), travel (may not come back).

Eight Seats:
• Effort unappreciated. Get more work, but no extra money.
• Avoid career matters, or starting work.

Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha:
• Being framed & used by other people to turn the situation around to your disadvantage.
• Inherit problems from other people.

Knife Block:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

Earth Forbid:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@1-3am & 9-11pm. Goat Blade. Month Emptiness. Heavenly Wealth. Prosperity Star. Fortune Growth. Heavenly Fortune. Golden Lock. Advancement Star. 

GRAND DUKE. Duke Punishment. Great Sha. Earthly Thief. Eight Seats. Ignorant Class. 4 Abandonment Day. Knife Block. 

Receive Day Usage:
•Attain something in particular: rewards.
•Ask & get in return.
•Start school, commence a course, close a deal, ask for a raise, propose marriage or ask for a new job.
•Recruitment, money collection, or collecting bad debts. 
•NOT FOR burial, seeking medical treatment, attending funerals, visit the sick unless you want to receive their illness.

Horn Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for travelling, marriage, ground breaking activities, door alignment.Heralds increased wealth and appreciating assets.
•NOT for burial, funeral.

Yellow Belt Golden Lock:
• Wealth star. Suitable for storage & preservation.
• Good for marriage, renovations, prayer for descendants, moving house.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@1-3am & 9-11pm. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Goat Blade:
• To do with authority and position.
• Used for leadership impact and to improve your position. 
• Helps you to take charge by taking someone else out.
• Motivation star. Can be used to reactivate personal motivation in a downward spiral.

Month Emptiness:
• Helps to let go of problems, emotions, relationships, or to empty out something. 
• Do some special activities to let go, e.g. throw or give away his/her belongings.

Heavenly Wealth:
• Easy money. 
• Can get money with no strings attached.

Prosperity Star:
• Good for events Good/happy ending, even if the process is bad.
• Bad things may have happened to someone, but he doesn’t blame others, still see goodness in it & doesn't feel too sad.
• NOT FOR funeral days.

Fortune Growth:
• Good for gaining weight & building muscles.
• Helps in academics. 
• Temple building day in olden times.

Heavenly Fortune:
• Good for meetings, social gatherings, moving house.

Golden Lock:
• Wealth star. 
• Good for marriage, renovations, prayer for descendants, moving house.

Advancement Star:
• Good for academic & scholarly pursuits.
• Good for taking exams, starting to study a subject


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
GRAND DUKE:
• Strongest annual energy. Causes health issues, legal issues or arguments.
• Can activate on good day if there are delayed lawsuits, to get the lawsuits moving & solve the issues. Need to have positive stars for protection when doing this.

Duke Punishment:
• Brings arguments and quarrels.
• Avoid groundbreaking and renovations.

Great Sha:
• Causes fighting & struggling. Death in extreme cases.

Earthly Thief:
• Loss of items externally. Ensure items are well kept.

Eight Seats:
• Effort unappreciated. Get more work, but no extra money.
• Avoid career matters, or starting work.

Ignorant Class:
• Bad relationships or response.
• E.g. wife trying to complain & the husband is ignoring the wife's complaints.

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

Knife Block:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@5-7am. Monthly Benevolence. Bright Hall. 

MONTH BREAKER/GREATER CONSUMER. MONTH CALAMITY SHA. Sword Edge. Earthly Fire/Month Detest. Heavenly Thief. Spirit Separator. Drapes. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. 4 Abandonment Day. 

Destruction Day Usage:
•Activity that needs to destroy something.
•Good to demolish a building or structure.
•Removing via medical procedure.
•Good for divorce.
•Good for restarting or destroying certain habits.
•NOT FOR marriage, engagement, opening a new business, commencing travel or signing a contract or legal agreement.

Weaving Maiden Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for academic & literary activities. Private or internal activities, starting a new course/commencing school. 
•NOT for public activities, legal issues, burial. Be conservative & humble. 

Yellow Belt Bright Hall:
• Get help, meet helpful people.
• Position bed & stove, renovations, move house.
• Good for status, position & career.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@5-7am. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Monthly Benevolence:
• Seek help or Nobleman. Get a favour, get someone to help you.

Bright Hall:
• Auspicious.
• Get help, meet helpful people, position bed & stove, renovations, moving house.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTH BREAKER/GREATER CONSUMER:
• Causes loss of wealth. NOT FOR product launch, wealth related activities.
• Useable to destroy or remove something. Can create inconvenient or uncomfortable feelings, so that day, start a planned out program.

MONTH CALAMITY SHA:
• Illness. Relationship issues. Betrayal.
• Scandals & sex-related issues.
• Avoid marriage, meetings, networking & medical procedures.

Sword Edge:
• Brings injuries & petty people.
• Avoid burial & renovation.

Earthly Fire/Month Detest:
• Obstacles, hiccups & unnecessary stress. Lose items, accidents. Not smooth sailing.
• NOT FOR moving house, travel, marriage.

Heavenly Thief:
• May miss out on something or lose something. 
• Avoid business launch, travel, renovation, moving house.

Spirit Separator:
• Avoid spiritual activities, prayer.

Drapes:
• Avoid marriage, relationships, moving house. 
• Keeps bringing out bad memories & histories during arguments.

Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha:
• Being framed & used by other people to turn the situation around to your disadvantage.
• Inherit problems from other people.

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

HEAVENLY VIRTUE. EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@9-11am. Relief God. Green Dragon. Ten Spiritual Days. Unicorn Day. 

MONTH ROBBERY SHA. Death Charm. Yellow Embrace. Lesser Consumer. 4 Abandonment Day. Do Not Visit The Sick Day. 

Initiate Day Usage:
•Commencing or beginning something, that requires a good beginning. Ground breaking, business opening.
•Good to accept work engagements or assignments. Signing agreements.
•Starting a new project on a good footing. House renovation.
•Test the market to see who are the right persons or right leads.
•NOT FOR moving house, or travelling. All Initiate Days have Lesser Consumer Stars which are associated with wealth loss.

Ox Constellation Usage:
•A disaster star and should not be present on any day used for important personal and business activities.
•NOT for marriage, burial, funeral, lawsuits & contract signings. 

Yellow Belt Green Dragon:
• Most auspicious, good news, wealth opportunity, meet boss.
• Suitable for happy events & most activities.
• Brings about happiness & contentment in life.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
HEAVENLY VIRTUE
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Cancels all negative energies (can ignore bad stars). 

EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@9-11am. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Relief God:
• Good for resolving issues (e.g. lose weight, filing legal defense).
• Can be both sentimental (Initiate Days in Yin Months) & merciless (Destruction Days in Yang Months).
• Install Feng Shui cures, e.g. metal placement for 5Y.

Green Dragon:
• Most auspicious.
• Good news, wealth opportunity, meet boss, suitable for all activities.

Ten Spiritual Days:
• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.

Unicorn Day:
• Spiritual activities, removal, protection
• Soothing effects useful in assuaging physical pain, suffering & flared tempers.
• Negates bad luck & misfortune.
• Traditionally used as marriage dates to "remove" negative energies.
• NOT FOR FENGSHUI.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTH ROBBERY SHA:
• Cheated, robbed, injury, business issues. No sales.
• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

Death Charm:
• Poor immunity, injury prone, health weakened. 
• Avoid health related activities, surgery, funerals, hospitals, renovations, moving bed, or any place with possible contamination.

Yellow Embrace:
• Affects vitality, energy & longevity. Energy drained. Avoid travel.

Lesser Consumer:
• Small loss of wealth.

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

Do Not Visit The Sick Day:
• Avoid visiting those with  ailment, illness or injury.
• Tendency to acquire what the person has.
• Avoid going to places with poor hygiene.

YEAR ANNUAL SHA. Grappling Hook. Wooden Horse. Five Ghost. Double Funeral. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. 

Stable Day Usage:
•Good to things needing stability such as getting married. Start new job if you want to be there long-term. Hire key staff.
•Seal an agreement, long term project or a deal with long term effect.
•Official opening of business, commencing work in on a property, buying a pet, house warming & seeking medical treatment.
•Creating networks connections.
•NOT FOR opening business, moving house, funeral, burial & travel as the effect will be consistent. 

Dipper Constellation Usage:
•Represents the Emperor. Star of Wealth, Literary and Military success. 
•SUITABLE for placement & alignment of door or water feature, commercial endeavours, start new job or form new business partnership, construction.
•NOT for personal activities. 

Black Belt Grappling Hook:
• Cheated, framed or involved in others' affairs. Avoid making promises or signing contracts.
• Indicates delays & obstacles.
• Useable to cheat others.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE COMBO:
• One of the most positive annual energies.
• Good stars remain positive & bad stars will be not as negative.
• Good for creating positive income & relationships.

EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@1-3pm. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Gold Hall:
• For those under employment. Meet superior for career upgrade, title recognition, increment, promotions. Need to connect to Bazi to get what you want.
• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Heavenly Noble:
• Get help from someone of similar status.
• Upgrade something, e.g. personal status.

Earthly Storage:
• Good for long term wealth, e.g. blue-chip investments, sign long-term agreements. Acquire long-term assets.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR ANNUAL SHA:
• Obstacles, accidents & delays. 
• Harms children/pets.
• Avoid starting projects with tight timelines, submitting documents that require quick approval or engaging in property-related transactions.

Grappling Hook:
• Cheated, framed or involved in others' affairs. Avoid making promises or signing contracts.
• Useable to cheat others.

Wooden Horse:
• Avoid marriage. Invokes a lot of hatred & dislike in marriage. One spouse may have a long-term illness. 

Five Ghost:
• Petty people. Avoid travel.
• Used to beat paper avatars of petty people with clogs.
• Can be used in a good way, they can also create fame & branding through other people's mouth: "That bitch is too good-looking. How unfair!" 

Double Funeral:
• Both good & bad effects doubled or amplified. Buy one get one free.
• Only good for wealth matters. Successful launching of business will receive double the rewards.
• Avoid burial, cremation, marriage.

Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha:
• Being framed & used by other people to turn the situation around to your disadvantage.
• Inherit problems from other people.

Sickness Charm. Heavenly Officer Charm. Sword Edge. Illness Star. Red Phoenix. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. Knife Block. Earth Forbid. 

Success Day Usage:

•Energies are positive so suitable for every kind of activity.
•Has a multiplier effect so use for positive not negative actions.
•Good for marriage, seeking medical treatment, commencing construction of a property, moving into a new home.
•Good for burial.
•NOT FOR initiating law suits or legal action.

Carriage Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for asset acquisition, marriage, investment seeking approval or requisitions of something from someone, starting school, commencing a course/study.
•NOT for travelling North.

Black Belt Red Phoenix:
• Creates a lot of hatred & arguments. Avoid discussions & arguments on this day.
• Avoid marriage, moving house, opening new door.
• Suitable for studying.

• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.

• Good for wealth purposes & investment.
• Good for money related activations & activities.
• Abundance, prosperity, wealth, auspicious for all activities.

Happy Spirit:
• Network, enhance relationships. Positive events. Marriage.

Monthly Benevolence:
• Seek help or Nobleman. Get a favour, get someone to help you.

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Monthly Wealth:
• Money from hard work & industry.

Universal Protection:
• Spiritual stability & protection, meditations, cleansing. 
• Personal protection, e.g. vaccination. 
• Install Feng Shui cures, e.g. metal placement for 5Y.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Sickness Charm:
• Brings illness and legal problems

Heavenly Officer Charm:
• Brings gossip.
• Avoid signing contracts.

Sword Edge:
• Brings injuries & petty people.
• Avoid burial & renovation.

• Avoid surgery, treatment & medical procedures.

• Avoid marriage, moving house, opening new door.
• Avoid discussions on this day.

• Inherit problems from other people.

• Avoid surgery.

• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

YEAR BREAKER. YEAR CALAMITY SHA. Heavenly Messenger. Unsuccessful. Emptiness. 

Balance Day Usage:
•Good for marriage, construction, business negotiation. Commencing travel.
•Produces a balanced outcome.
•When you are less powerful, use this to restore the balance.
•Nothing major happens when you use this day.
•NOT FOR lawsuits, distribution of wealth, contesting a will or division of assets & burial, launching, legal actions.

Net Constellation Usage:
•Generally benevolent star that brings about harmonious outcomes, peaceful relationships and is generally a good day for most activities.
•SUITABLE for construction, land acquisition, marriage. 
•NOT for other commencements.

Yellow Belt Life Governor:
• Authority star. Good for renovations, repair. 
• Beneficial for work & career advancement.
• Auspicious during day time, inauspicious during night.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@9-11am. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Heavenly Officer:
• Meet superior. Get support from senior authority. 
• Supports career. Good to start work, assume new post, resolve issues.
• Lawsuits or court case, better avoid these days as you don't know whether it is a problematic position.

Jade House:
• For those under employment. Meet superior for career upgrade, title recognition, increment, promotions. Need to connect to Bazi to get what you want.
• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Life Governor:
• Authority star. Good for renovations, repair. Auspicious during day time, inauspicious during night.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR BREAKER:
• Loss of property or wealth. Trouble for elderly family members.
• Lose recognition or ignored.
• Can use if you don't have good communication with family & want to create some impact, e.g. expose someone's anger & start to talk.

YEAR CALAMITY SHA:
• Illness. Relationship issues. Betrayal.
• Scandals & sex-related issues.
• Avoid marriage, meetings, networking & medical procedures.

Heavenly Messenger:
• Creates bad omen & auras. 
• Miscommunication prone. Tendency to receive wrong information or fake news. Do not convey information on this day.
• Useable to create bad news & misinformation.

Unsuccessful:
• Whatever started ends up cancelled or terminated.

Emptiness:
• Avoid moving house or travelling, starting jobs, marriage.

DUKE VIRTUE COMBO. HEAVENLY VIRTUE COMBO. EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@1-3pm. Yin Noble. Duke Branch Virtue. Wealth Storage. Sky Horse. Heavenly Fortune. Important Stability. Heavenly Noble. Ten Spiritual Days. 

YEAR ROBBERY SHA. Black Tortoise. Earth Depression. Flying Chaste. Double Funeral. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. 

Full Day Usage:
•For plentiful returns. Good for recruitment & launching of products for wealth.
•Signing agreements & openings. Opening something that needs a multiplier effect like a chain of stores etc.
•Housewarming parties, installing new equipment. Debt collection.
•NOT FOR marriage (a house full of wives), signing legal agreements or commencing any law suits, new jobs, demolishing buildings, burial.

Pleiades Constellation Usage:
•Extremely negative star. Best not to avoid for any important personal or business activities, especially marriage, debt collection and commencing a lawsuit.
•NOT for all activities.

Black Belt Black Tortoise:
• Treachery, cheated, trapped, lose wealth or items. Petty people & thieves.
• Avoid others' affairs, funerals. 
• Use to delude, cheat & betray others, disseminate misleading information.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE COMBO:
• One of the most positive annual energies.
• Good stars remain positive & bad stars will be not as negative.
• Good for creating positive income & relationships.

HEAVENLY VIRTUE COMBO
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Creates meaningful relationships, build trust, networking, branding, sign agreement.

EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@1-3pm. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Yin Noble:
• Helpful people luck. Usually female.
• Use this day if you know the person that can help you is female.
• Useable for corporate recruitment.

Duke Branch Virtue:
• Activates positive energy. Negate & neutralize negative Qi.        
• Good for forming new businesses.

Wealth Storage:
• Good for increasing value, intellectual property, investment of wealth. 

Sky Horse:
• Great for creating energy & opportunities (within you, or external environment). Create/open new markets.
• Good for travelling or overseas business related matters to reduce obstacles.
• Speeds up the result of e-commerce transactions. 
• Additional or Bonus income. Settle outstanding matters.

Heavenly Fortune:
• Non-money windfall. 
• Good to request for freebies.

Important Stability:
• Creates stability. Good to sign documents, keep important things.
• Good for physical security, safety measures, security systems, install CCTV.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Heavenly Noble:
• Get help from someone of similar status.
• Upgrade something, e.g. personal status.

Ten Spiritual Days:
• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR ROBBERY SHA:
• Cheated, robbed, injury, business issues. No sales.
• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

Black Tortoise:
• Treachery, cheated, trapped, lose items. Petty people & thieves.
• Avoid others' affairs, funerals. 
• Use to delude, cheat & betray others, disseminate misleading information.

Earth Depression:
Others can see or pick on mistakes from your actions even if you are doing something right.

Flying Chaste:
• Affects reputation.

Double Funeral:
• Both good & bad effects doubled or amplified. Buy one get one free.
• Only good for wealth matters. Successful launching of business will receive double the rewards.
• Avoid burial, cremation, marriage.

Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha:
• Being framed & used by other people to turn the situation around to your disadvantage.
• Inherit problems from other people.

• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.

MONTH ESTABLISH. WHITE TIGER ENTERING CENTRAL PALACE. Earthly Officer Charm. Heavenly Bat. Earth Mansion. 

Establish Day Usage:
•Getting engaged or proposing but not getting married. Commencing work or a new job.
•Making business transactions or new deals.
•Commencing travel. Start education. Start a process.
•Starting construction but not groundbreaking.
•NOT FOR demolition or ground breaking, attending or conducting funerals or burials.

Horn Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for travelling, marriage, ground breaking activities, door alignment.Heralds increased wealth and appreciating assets.
•NOT for burial, funeral.

Black Belt White Tiger:
• Indicates mourning & funeral.

• Bleeding, pain and health issues.
• Avoid surgery & high-risk activities.
• Suitable for competition & contests.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
Year Storage:
• Good for asset acquisition.
• If matched with Personal Heavenly Wealth Day, asset would eventually appreciate and contribute to your existing wealth.

Month Emptiness:
• Helps to let go of problems, emotions, relationships, or to empty out something. 
• Do some special activities to let go, e.g. throw or give away his/her belongings.

Month Storage:
• Good for asset acquisition.
• If matched with Personal Heavenly Wealth Day, asset would eventually appreciate and contribute to your existing wealth.

Heavenly Horse:
• Great for creating energy & opportunities (within you, or external environment). Create/open new markets.
• Good for travelling or overseas business related matters to reduce obstacles.
• Speeds up the result of e-commerce transactions. 
• Additional or Bonus income. Settle outstanding matters.

Earthly Storage:
• Good for long term wealth, e.g. blue-chip investments, sign long-term agreements. Acquire long-term assets.

MONTH ESTABLISH:
• Employees: Don't do presentations, suggest ideas, performance reviews. Don’t meet or discuss with boss. Don't argue, just listen to the boss. 
• Employer: Good day to get rid of an unwanted subordinate.
• Avoid Feng Shui activation, renovation, ground breaking or knocking on wall.

WHITE TIGER ENTERS CENTRAL PALACE: 
• Avoid surgery, Feng Shui activities, construction, renovation, ground breaking & moving house.
• Avoid major activities.

Earthly Officer Charm:
• Avoid renovation & repairs.

Heavenly Bat:
• Petty people. 
• Avoid settling lawsuits.

Earth Mansion:
• Do not start renovation on this day. 
• Small wealth loss.

DUKE VIRTUE. HEAVENLY VIRTUE. MONTHLY VIRTUE. Heavenly Officer. Three Harmony. Life Governor. 

Earthly Fire/Month Detest. Receive Death. Five Ghost. 4 Abandonment Day. 

Stable Day Usage:
•Good to things needing stability such as getting married. Start new job if you want to be there long-term. Hire key staff.
•Seal an agreement, long term project or a deal with long term effect.
•Official opening of business, commencing work in on a property, buying a pet, house warming & seeking medical treatment.
•Creating networks connections.
•NOT FOR opening business, moving house, funeral, burial & travel as the effect will be consistent. 

Heart Constellation Usage:
•Usually regarded as a negative star.
•SUITABLE for travelling, harvesting commodities, prayer, moving.
•NOT for lawsuit, break ground or burial - causes arguments. 

Yellow Belt Life Governor:
• Authority star. Good for renovations, repair. 
• Beneficial for work & career advancement.
• Auspicious during day time, inauspicious during night.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE:
• Most positive of the energy of the year.
• Good stars remain positive &bad stars will be not as negative.
• Good for creating positive income.

HEAVENLY VIRTUE
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Cancels all negative energies (can ignore bad stars). 

MONTHLY VIRTUE
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Cancels all negative energies (can ignore bad stars). 

Heavenly Officer:
• Meet superior. Get support from senior authority. 
• Supports career. Good to start work, assume new post, resolve issues.
• Lawsuits or court case, better avoid these days as you don't know whether it is a problematic position.

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Life Governor:
• Authority star. Good for renovations, repair. Auspicious during day time, inauspicious during night.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
Earthly Fire/Month Detest:
• Obstacles, hiccups & unnecessary stress. Lose items, accidents. Not smooth sailing.
• NOT FOR moving house, travel, marriage.

Receive Death:
• When used to start something, may receive threats from others.
• Useable to threaten others.

Five Ghost:
• Petty people. Avoid travel.
• Used to beat paper avatars of petty people with clogs.
• Can be used in a good way, they can also create fame & branding through other people's mouth: "That bitch is too good-looking. How unfair!" 

4 Abandonment Day:
• Weakest Days of the season.
• Avoid significant activities.

Close Day Usage:
•Qi is at the lowest point, last day of the cycle.
•Possible to use for medication & qigong.
•If you or your partner is having an interesting relationship, choosing a close day can reduce the impact.
•End something undesirable, to have no connection in the future.
•NOT FOR anything that is important or of personal or professional significance. Not for surgery, or acupuncture.

Carriage Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for asset acquisition, marriage, investment seeking approval or requisitions of something from someone, starting school, commencing a course/study.
•NOT for travelling North.

• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.

HEAVENLY 3 NOBLE@3-5pm. Goat Blade. Happy Spirit. Monthly Benevolence. Three Harmony. Important Stability. Heavenly Noble. Unicorn Day. 

GRAND DUKE. Duke Punishment. Great Sha. Sky Bright. Ignorant Class. Knife Block. Do Not Visit The Sick Day. 

Success Day Usage:
•Most auspicious of all the clays.
•Energies are positive so suitable for every kind of activity.
•Has a multiplier effect so use for positive not negative actions.
•Good for marriage, seeking medical treatment, commencing construction of a property, moving into a new home.
•Good for burial.
•NOT FOR initiating law suits or legal action.

Ox Constellation Usage:
•A disaster star and should not be present on any day used for important personal and business activities.
•NOT for marriage, burial, funeral, lawsuits & contract signings. 

Black Belt Heavenly Punishment:
• Indicates water related disasters, rain & calamities.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
HEAVENLY 3 NOBLE@3-5pm. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Goat Blade:
• To do with authority and position.
• Used for leadership impact and to improve your position. 
• Helps you to take charge by taking someone else out.
• Motivation star. Can be used to reactivate personal motivation in a downward spiral.

Happy Spirit:
• Network, enhance relationships. Positive events. Marriage.

Monthly Benevolence:
• Seek help or Nobleman. Get a favour, get someone to help you.

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Important Stability:
• Creates stability. Good to sign documents, keep important things.
• Good for physical security, safety measures, security systems, install CCTV.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Heavenly Noble:
• Get help from someone of similar status.
• Upgrade something, e.g. personal status.

Unicorn Day:
• Spiritual activities, removal, protection
• Soothing effects useful in assuaging physical pain, suffering & flared tempers.
• Negates bad luck & misfortune.
• Traditionally used as marriage dates to "remove" negative energies.
• NOT FOR FENGSHUI.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
GRAND DUKE:
• Strongest annual energy. Causes health issues, legal issues or arguments.
• Can activate on good day if there are delayed lawsuits, to get the lawsuits moving & solve the issues. Need to have positive stars for protection when doing this.

Duke Punishment:
• Brings arguments and quarrels.
• Avoid groundbreaking and renovations.

Great Sha:
• Causes fighting & struggling. Death in extreme cases.

Sky Bright:
• Creates bad omen & auras. 
• Avoid spiritual activities, prayer.

Ignorant Class:
• Bad relationships or response.
• E.g. wife trying to complain & the husband is ignoring the wife's complaints.

Knife Block:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

Do Not Visit The Sick Day:
• Avoid visiting those with  ailment, illness or injury.
• Tendency to acquire what the person has.
• Avoid going to places with poor hygiene.

Month Punishment. Red Phoenix. Eight Seats. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. 

Receive Day Usage:
•Attain something in particular: rewards.
•Ask & get in return.
•Start school, commence a course, close a deal, ask for a raise, propose marriage or ask for a new job.
•Recruitment, money collection, or collecting bad debts. 
•NOT FOR burial, seeking medical treatment, attending funerals, visit the sick unless you want to receive their illness.

Weaving Maiden Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for academic & literary activities. Private or internal activities, starting a new course/commencing school. 
•NOT for public activities, legal issues, burial. Be conservative & humble. 

Black Belt Red Phoenix:

DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE COMBO:
• One of the most positive annual energies.
• Good stars remain positive & bad stars will be not as negative.
• Good for creating positive income & relationships.

HEAVENLY VIRTUE COMBO
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Creates meaningful relationships, build trust, networking, branding, sign agreement.

MONTHLY VIRTUE COMBO
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Creates meaningful relationships, build trust, networking, branding, sign agreement.

Month Storage:
• Good for asset acquisition.

Jade House:

• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Heavenly Noble:
• Get help from someone of similar status.
• Upgrade something, e.g. personal status.

Earthly Storage:

Month Punishment:
• Careless mistakes, especially in professional fields (e.g. doctors etc.)
• Avoid starting new job, trading, renovation.

Red Phoenix:
• Creates a lot of hatred & arguments. 
• Avoid marriage, moving house, opening new door.
• Avoid discussions on this day.

Eight Seats:
• Effort unappreciated. Get more work, but no extra money.
• Avoid career matters, or starting work.

Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha:
• Being framed & used by other people to turn the situation around to your disadvantage.
• Inherit problems from other people.

• If with Year breaker, sometimes good, sometimes negative impact.

• Helps to let go of problems, emotions, relationships, or to empty out something. 
• Do some special activities to let go, e.g. throw or give away his/her belongings.

Life Generating:
• Great for creating energy & opportunities (within you, or external environment).
• Create/open new markets, construction.

Sky Horse:
• Great for creating energy & opportunities (within you, or external environment). Create/open new markets.

Abundant Fortune:

Golden Lock:

• Good for marriage, renovations, prayer for descendants, moving house.

• Avoid business launch, travel, renovation, moving house.

Goat Blade. Happy Spirit. Three Harmony. Important Stability. Ten Spiritual Days. 

GRAND DUKE. Duke Punishment. Great Sha. Sky Bright. Double Funeral. Ignorant Class. Knife Block. 

Success Day Usage:
•Most auspicious of all the clays.
•Energies are positive so suitable for every kind of activity.
•Has a multiplier effect so use for positive not negative actions.
•Good for marriage, seeking medical treatment, commencing construction of a property, moving into a new home.
•Good for burial.
•NOT FOR initiating law suits or legal action.

Star Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for marriage, negotiations, commencing an important project, official openings.
•NOT for funerals & burial.

Black Belt Heavenly Punishment:
• Indicates water related disasters, rain & calamities.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
Goat Blade:
• To do with authority and position.
• Used for leadership impact and to improve your position. 
• Helps you to take charge by taking someone else out.
• Motivation star. Can be used to reactivate personal motivation in a downward spiral.

Happy Spirit:
• Network, enhance relationships. Positive events. Marriage.

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Important Stability:
• Creates stability. Good to sign documents, keep important things.
• Good for physical security, safety measures, security systems, install CCTV.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Ten Spiritual Days:
• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
GRAND DUKE:
• Strongest annual energy. Causes health issues, legal issues or arguments.
• Can activate on good day if there are delayed lawsuits, to get the lawsuits moving & solve the issues. Need to have positive stars for protection when doing this.

Duke Punishment:
• Brings arguments and quarrels.
• Avoid groundbreaking and renovations.

Great Sha:
• Causes fighting & struggling. Death in extreme cases.

Sky Bright:
• Creates bad omen & auras. 
• Avoid spiritual activities, prayer.

Double Funeral:
• Both good & bad effects doubled or amplified. Buy one get one free.
• Only good for wealth matters. Successful launching of business will receive double the rewards.
• Avoid burial, cremation, marriage.

Ignorant Class:
• Bad relationships or response.
• E.g. wife trying to complain & the husband is ignoring the wife's complaints.

Knife Block:
• Accidents, injury.
• Avoid surgery.

MONTH BREAKER/GREATER CONSUMER. No Wealth Day (Minor). Unsuccessful. Emptiness. 

Destruction Day Usage:
•Activity that needs to destroy something.
•Good to demolish a building or structure.
•Removing via medical procedure.
•Good for divorce.
•Good for restarting or destroying certain habits.
•NOT FOR marriage, engagement, opening a new business, commencing travel or signing a contract or legal agreement.

Net Constellation Usage:
•Generally benevolent star that brings about harmonious outcomes, peaceful relationships and is generally a good day for most activities.
•SUITABLE for construction, land acquisition, marriage. 
•NOT for other commencements.

Yellow Belt Green Dragon:
• Most auspicious, good news, wealth opportunity, meet boss.
• Suitable for happy events & most activities.
• Brings about happiness & contentment in life.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
HEAVENLY 3 NOBLE@3-5pm. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Month Storage:
• Good for asset acquisition.
• If matched with Personal Heavenly Wealth Day, asset would eventually appreciate and contribute to your existing wealth.

Monthly Benevolence:
• Seek help or Nobleman. Get a favour, get someone to help you.

Benefit Descendants:
• Good for conceiving males, adopting children or pets.
• Recruitment activities.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Relief God:
• Good for resolving issues (e.g. lose weight, filing legal defense).
• Can be both sentimental (Initiate Days in Yin Months) & merciless (Destruction Days in Yang Months).
• Install Feng Shui cures, e.g. metal placement for 5Y.

Heavenly Noble:
• Get help from someone of similar status.
• Upgrade something, e.g. personal status.

Earthly Storage:
• Good for long term wealth, e.g. blue-chip investments, sign long-term agreements. Acquire long-term assets.

Green Dragon:
• Most auspicious.
• Good news, wealth opportunity, meet boss, suitable for all activities.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
MONTH BREAKER/GREATER CONSUMER:
• Causes loss of wealth. NOT FOR product launch, wealth related activities.
• Useable to destroy or remove something. Can create inconvenient or uncomfortable feelings, so that day, start a planned out program.

No Wealth Day (Minor). :
• Avoid for trading & wealth related activities, moving office, product launch.
• Avoid signing contracts, closing business deals, business trips or official openings.
• Does not matter if doing activities NOT related to wealth, e.g. medical consultation. 

Unsuccessful:
• Whatever started ends up cancelled or terminated.

Emptiness:
• Avoid moving house or travelling, starting jobs, marriage.

YEAR ANNUAL SHA. WHITE TIGER ENTERING CENTRAL PALACE. Sword Edge. Grappling Hook. Wooden Horse. Five Ghost. Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha. 

Stable Day Usage:
•Good to things needing stability such as getting married. Start new job if you want to be there long-term. Hire key staff.
•Seal an agreement, long term project or a deal with long term effect.
•Official opening of business, commencing work in on a property, buying a pet, house warming & seeking medical treatment.
•Creating networks connections.
•NOT FOR opening business, moving house, funeral, burial & travel as the effect will be consistent. 

Beak Constellation Usage:
•Considered a highly negative and unfavourable star to have present. Avoid any important personal and business activities.
•NOT for all significant activities.

Black Belt Grappling Hook:
• Cheated, framed or involved in others' affairs. Avoid making promises or signing contracts.
• Indicates delays & obstacles.
• Useable to cheat others.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
EARTHLY 3 NOBLE@5-7am. :
• External nobleman help. Used for seeking help from people.
• Good for dealing with lawsuit related issues.
• Good for property auctions.

Monthly Benevolence:
• Seek help or Nobleman. Get a favour, get someone to help you.

Three Harmony:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Gold Hall:
• For those under employment. Meet superior for career upgrade, title recognition, increment, promotions. Need to connect to Bazi to get what you want.
• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Earthly Storage:
• Good for long term wealth, e.g. blue-chip investments, sign long-term agreements. Acquire long-term assets.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR ANNUAL SHA:
• Obstacles, accidents & delays. 
• Harms children/pets.
• Avoid starting projects with tight timelines, submitting documents that require quick approval or engaging in property-related transactions.

WHITE TIGER ENTERS CENTRAL PALACE: 
• Avoid surgery, Feng Shui activities, construction, renovation, ground breaking & moving house.
• Avoid major activities.

Sword Edge:
• Brings injuries & petty people.
• Avoid burial & renovation.

Grappling Hook:
• Cheated, framed or involved in others' affairs. Avoid making promises or signing contracts.
• Useable to cheat others.

Wooden Horse:
• Avoid marriage. Invokes a lot of hatred & dislike in marriage. One spouse may have a long-term illness. 

Five Ghost:
• Petty people. Avoid travel.
• Used to beat paper avatars of petty people with clogs.
• Can be used in a good way, they can also create fame & branding through other people's mouth: "That bitch is too good-looking. How unfair!" 

Heaven & Earth Shifting Sha:
• Being framed & used by other people to turn the situation around to your disadvantage.
• Inherit problems from other people.

Phoenix Day:
• Spiritual activities, removal, protection

• Negates bad luck & misfortune.
• Traditionally used as marriage dates to "remove" negative energies.

MONTH ROBBERY SHA:

Receive Death:

• Avoid career matters, or starting work.

Wooden Horse. Destructive. Heaven & Earth Axis. 

Balance Day Usage:
•Good for marriage, construction, business negotiation. Commencing travel.
•Produces a balanced outcome.
•When you are less powerful, use this to restore the balance.
•Nothing major happens when you use this day.
•NOT FOR lawsuits, distribution of wealth, contesting a will or division of assets & burial, launching, legal actions.

Horn Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for travelling, marriage, ground breaking activities, door alignment.Heralds increased wealth and appreciating assets.

Black Belt Heavenly Jail:

• Avoid settling disputes.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
HEAVENLY VIRTUE COMBO
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Creates meaningful relationships, build trust, networking, branding, sign agreement.

Month Emptiness:
• Helps to let go of problems, emotions, relationships, or to empty out something. 
• Do some special activities to let go, e.g. throw or give away his/her belongings.

Six Combo:
• Create good relationships & partnerships, especially marriage & romance.
• Commitment, connection, relationship, partnership. Sign contracts.

Bright Star:
• Visibility, fame, popularity. Entertainment related.
• Good for social media postings.

Five Fortune:
• Good for people gathering activities, e.g. announcement of marriage.
• Commence new business, new job, move into new house, burial, repairs.

Gold Hall:
• For those under employment. Meet superior for career upgrade, title recognition, increment, promotions. Need to connect to Bazi to get what you want.
• Start new job. 
• Temple building day in olden times. Also used to stick gold on statues.

Ten Spiritual Days:
• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
Wooden Horse:
• Avoid marriage. Invokes a lot of hatred & dislike in marriage. One spouse may have a long-term illness. 

Destructive:
• Turns all things positive to negative.
• Avoid important activities.

Heaven & Earth Axis:
• Avoid spiritual activities.
• Tendency for spiritual disturbances.

Danger Day Usage:

•Used for religious worship.
•Ground breaking. Dismantling objects.
•Bed positioning (Dong Gong’s bed shifting).
•NOT FOR high risk sports or activities, or commencing long journeys. Avoid heights or being at sea, marriage or burial.

Beak Constellation Usage:

DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE COMBO:

• Good stars remain positive & bad stars will be not as negative.

HEAVENLY VIRTUE COMBO
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Creates meaningful relationships, build trust, networking, branding, sign agreement.

MONTHLY VIRTUE COMBO
• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.

Duke Reward:

Continuous Descendants:
• Good for conceiving females, adopting children or pets.
• Recruitment activities.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Yin Virtue:
• Collect good karma. Dissolve bad karma. 
• Spiritual cleansing.
• Impact is stronger when with other positive stars.

Heavenly Noble:

• Upgrade something, e.g. personal status.

Bright Hall:

• Get help, meet helpful people, position bed & stove, renovations, moving house.

No Wealth Day (Minor). :
• Avoid for trading & wealth related activities, moving office, product launch.
• Avoid signing contracts, closing business deals, business trips or official openings.
• Does not matter if doing activities NOT related to wealth, e.g. medical consultation. 

Sickness Charm:
• Brings illness and legal problems

Heavenly Officer Charm:
• Brings gossip.
• Avoid signing contracts.

Illness Star:
• Avoid surgery, treatment & medical procedures.

Heavenly Depression:
• Creates bad omen & auras. 
• For cursing others. 
• Avoid construction, prayer, medical treatment.

Initiate Day Usage:

•Good to accept work engagements or assignments. Signing agreements.
•Starting a new project on a good footing. House renovation.
•Test the market to see who are the right persons or right leads.

Heavenly Officer:

• Supports career. Good to start work, assume new post, resolve issues.

• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.

•Official opening of business, commencing work in on a property, buying a pet, house warming & seeking medical treatment.

Receive Day Usage:

Close Day Usage:

•Possible to use for medication & qigong.
•If you or your partner is having an interesting relationship, choosing a close day can reduce the impact.
•End something undesirable, to have no connection in the future.
•NOT FOR anything that is important or of personal or professional significance. Not for surgery, or acupuncture.

Orion Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for Feng Shui activities, travel, renovation and construction. Extremely favourable, heralding fame & achievements 
•NOT for marriage or burial.

Yellow Belt Golden Lock:
• Wealth star. Suitable for storage & preservation.
• Good for marriage, renovations, prayer for descendants, moving house.

• Highly auspicious, strongest Month energy.
• Creates meaningful relationships, build trust, networking, branding, sign agreement.

Year Storage:
• Good for asset acquisition.
• If matched with Personal Heavenly Wealth Day, asset would eventually appreciate and contribute to your existing wealth.

Month Emptiness:
• Helps to let go of problems, emotions, relationships, or to empty out something. 
• Do some special activities to let go, e.g. throw or give away his/her belongings.

Month Storage:

• Good for conceiving males, adopting children or pets.
• Recruitment activities.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Golden Lock:
• Wealth star. 
• Good for marriage, renovations, prayer for descendants, moving house.

Ten Spiritual Days:
• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.

• Obstacles, accidents & delays.

Blood Branch:
• Likelihood of small injuries. Avoid surgery & acupuncture.

• Avoid spiritual activities.
• Tendency for spiritual disturbances.

• Avoid surgery, health treatments, and medical procedures.

YEAR ROBBERY SHA. MONTH ESTABLISH. Month Punishment. Heavenly Depression. Spirit Separator. Unsuccessful. Blood Fear. Earth Mansion. 

Establish Day Usage:
•Getting engaged or proposing but not getting married. Commencing work or a new job.
•Making business transactions or new deals.
•Commencing travel. Start education. Start a process.
•Starting construction but not groundbreaking.
•NOT FOR demolition or ground breaking, attending or conducting funerals or burials.

Well Constellation Usage:
•SUITABLE for Feng Shui activities, aligning door or water placement, ground breaking or commencing a work project.
•NOT for burial, signing contracts and marriage.

Yellow Belt Precious Light:
• Getting help & looking for Nobleman.
• Good for travel.


DETAILS OF AUSPICIOUS STARS:
DUKE VIRTUE COMBO:
• One of the most positive annual energies.
• Good stars remain positive & bad stars will be not as negative.
• Good for creating positive income & relationships.

Yin Noble:
• Helpful people luck. Usually female.
• Use this day if you know the person that can help you is female.
• Useable for corporate recruitment.

Duke Branch Virtue:
• Activates positive energy. Negate & neutralize negative Qi.        
• Good for forming new businesses.

Earthly Wealth:
• Supports long term investments (property, businesses, assets, investments).
• Good impact for starting or launching a business, creating value.

Continuous Descendants:
• Good for conceiving females, adopting children or pets.
• Recruitment activities.
• Temple building day in olden times.

Abundant Fortune:
• Increasing sales, upselling. Outstanding launching. Celebrations.

Precious Light:
• Nobleman help. Good for travel.

Ten Spiritual Days:
• Good for metaphysical, religious, spiritual & meditative pursuits.
• Study & research into mysteries of life.
• More powerful if with Holy Heart.
• Less powerful if with negative month stars.
• Is a transforming day if the Stem or Branch combines with your DM.


DETAILS OF INAUSPICIOUS STARS:
YEAR ROBBERY SHA:
• Cheated, robbed, injury, business issues. No sales.
• Avoid business launches or significant wealth related activities.
• Problems while traveling.

MONTH ESTABLISH:
• Employees: Don't do presentations, suggest ideas, performance reviews. Don’t meet or discuss with boss. Don't argue, just listen to the boss. 
• Employer: Good day to get rid of an unwanted subordinate.
• Avoid Feng Shui activation, renovation, ground breaking or knocking on wall.

Month Punishment:
• Careless mistakes, especially in professional fields (e.g. doctors etc.)
• Avoid starting new job, trading, renovation.

Heavenly Depression:
• Creates bad omen & auras. 
• For cursing others. 
• Avoid construction, prayer, medical treatment.

Spirit Separator:
• Avoid spiritual activities, prayer.

Unsuccessful:
• Whatever started ends up cancelled or terminated.

Blood Fear:
• Avoid surgery, acupuncture. health-related procedures, assisting  kin.

Earth Mansion:
• Do not start renovation on this day. 
• Small wealth loss.
